Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
  m0rjc.ax25.generator.simulatorBuilder.Simulation

public class Simulation
extends Object

Simulation of the state engine with methods to check the internal state.

public m0rjc.ax25.generator.simulatorBuilder.ActionResult runSharedEntryCode(String stateName)
                                                                      throws SimulationException
Simulate the shared entry code for the node with the given name.

Parameters:
stateName - node name to look for
Returns:
ActionResult.RETURN_FROM_STATE_ENGINE because all entry code should end this way.
Throws:
SimulationException - if the code fails
